title: Best ever beef stew
ingredients: ['500g diced beef stewing steak', '1 teaspoon oil (any apart from olive oil)', '1 onion, chopped roughly', '2 carrots, chopped into chunks', '2 potatoes, chopped into a 2" dice', '1 teaspoon minced garlic', '1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce', '1 glass red wine', '1 teaspoon beef stock granules (optional)', '1 fresh thyme sprig (or 1 teaspoon dried thyme)', '2 bay leaves', 'salt and pepper', 'water to cover']
